ect: Re: OOC

2:25 PM


=C2=A0 




To those who are re-entering the game, just let me kn=
ow what you need from me to make your entry as smooth as possible. I am try=
ing to create openings to let you take over your characters, although some =
of them may have just been inactive so you can probrably start them most an=
ywhere. 
=C2=A0
However I can help, please don't hesitate to let me know. 
=
=C2=A0
Preston


On Sat, Sep 18, 2010 at 8:37 PM, Preston Carroll <supercyc=
lonus@...> wrote:

WHOO HOO!! Good to see different ones returning!! =
:)

I have been taking on the roles of many of the background characters to=
 keep the group moving, but the ones I have are yours if you like. 

Curren=
tly Waspinator is with Hydras on his way to the Valley Mine City, along wit=
h Tarantulus, Terrorsaur, and 4 of the Fuzors: Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorga=
tor, and Quickstrike. The group is being escorted/guarded/watched by Tankor=
 along with several tank drones. 

So far Wapinator appears to be loyal to =
Hydras, but I will leave it to you if that remains that way. 

Silverbolt a=
nd Cheetor are at the Ark, pretty much watching over the drama of Tuscon an=
d Rodimus. You can check out recent posts for that if you=C2=A0 like. 

Tan=
kor, were you planning on wanting Tankor back as well?

Also, as a side not=
e to all, with so many characters hitting the playing field I may also be d=
ialing back what I am doing to allow for more freedom for others. What this=
 means is that I will slowly be letting go of my background characters, and=
 allow others to fill in as they go. I am not dropping everything at once, =
and will try to make this as smooth as possible. 

If there is anything I c=
an do to help anyone PLEASE feel free to talk to me on or off list. 

Prest=
on 






On Sat, Sep 18, 2010 at 5:51 PM, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wr=
ote:


=C2=A0 



I think I'll rejoin fully at this point too. I have my in=
ternet back and have time to post again.=C2=A0 An active RPG seems like a g=
ood place for me to restart posting. 

As I recall, Rhinox was inside the B=
ushido Predecon's base, but that plot has kind of fallen to the side.=C2=A0=
 Other characters at that base are Kratos, some soul-eating predecon (I thi=
nk), and Lady Spire (indefinitely in a hidden stasis chamber).=C2=A0 So you=
 can either start there, or bring him outside and let him find trouble.

I =
think Waspinator, Silverbolt, Starscream and Cheetor are inactive (someone =
may have tried to carry them along for a bit, but a lot of characters have =
dropped off).=C2=A0 I don't remember Arcee.

As for my charcters, all of th=
e Maximals except Depthcharge and Ravenchief are in the Maximal base.=C2=A0=
 I have a couple Predecons that are off the radar at the moment.

Welcome b=
ack

-Kraftlos (titobeau)
